title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOURS 1-2:

Rush welcomes President Trump for the largest Radio Rally in history. President Trump on the power of Rush, poll. President Trump wants to know why liberals want a country in turmoil, stoked by dishonest media. Trump on his COVID diagnosis, recovery, Regeneron. Why the president has to tout his own successes. Rush and Trump on the left, media. Nobel Peace Prize. The wall, illegal immigration. How Trump upended and surprised the establishment by winning. Trump rallies are fun. The media doesn't cover Trump accomplishments like Space Force. The polls are fake, oversample Democrats. Trump takes questions from the audience: Trump's health care plan covers preexisting conditions. When Trump took over, the military was depleted, Trump rebuilt it. Trump: When we're beating them, they have nothing but to call us racists. Chris Wallace saved Biden at the debate. Rush plays Biden clips for Trump's response on coal, race. Trump: Biden is out of it. Rush continues Radio Rally with President Trump. Gallup poll says 56% of Americans are better off than they were four years ago. President Trump is the wall between America becoming a socialist, third world country like Venezuela. Kamala Harris is further left of Crazy Bernie. Pelosi's 25th Amendment gambit is a trial run to get rid of Biden, install Harris. Trump on ballot fraud. Trump on coronavirus response. Trump reacts to Axios story claiming Barr and Durham won't issue report or more indictments before the election. How Fox News has changed in four years. Paul Ryan on board. NBA, NFL ratings down after BLM support. LeBron James anger, hate turns off fans. Black Lives Matter is a Marxist organization. How Democrats have smeared police officers. Rush and Trump on Rudy and New York. The status of the stimulus package. China's currency manipulation. Trump makes predictions on what will happen around the world if he wins. Rush: The president has gone 1:40 without a break, he's obviously not sick. The American people have no idea what's in store for them if Democrats win. This is the most important election this country has ever had. NATO no longer takes advantage of America. Angela Merkel's pipeline deal with Russia. Trump on Putin. Biden is not equipped to be president. Biden reads interview questions off of computer. Hillary vs. Biden. Biden on Indians at 7/11s. Ballot fraud could be the second biggest political scandal in history after the Russia collusion hoax. Republicans will go out in droves to vote on election day. President Trump is the person we're depending on to stave off the attack on our country from within.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
